ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 839
ygData.msgSnippet: This is something that ties to basic design of the Bard class itself. In early beta, the Bard sang his/her song to everyone around them. ... In beta 4, my
ygData.messageBody:
This is something that ties to basic design of the Bard class itself.

In early beta, the Bard sang his/her song to everyone around them.

-----

In beta 4, my friends used to joke that bard hate was so strong, mobs would
come from other zones just to whack me. I always figured orcs just hated
music. It was so bad I got to the point I never played any songs in GF or
I'd draw a huge crowd of booing mobs all armed with rotting vegetables.

-Treehugger and Songmaker
